segments.text: Hello ? Ms . Patterson ? This is Bill from Workmate calling . I'm just wondering if you had a chance to look over the estimate I sent for your gala dinner project next month ... As I said in my email , we can help you with production according to your needs , but we will only be able to give insite management support services on a limited basis .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . I reviewed your estimate . But it seems like the project blueprint you sent with the estimate is not quite what we had in mind . Did you get a copy of the specs for this project ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I have several copies , but they're all different versions ... The latest I have is version 12 , is that current ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Later we decided to opt for the prior outline , version 7 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hold on , let me pull up your version 7 requirements ... Oh yes , no wonder our estimate is a little different from what you had in mind . I see the version 7 also includes 6 additional hostesses and a cocktail self-serve bar that wasn't in the version 12 . That will definitely add to your cost on this project ...
segments.speaker: S1
